comments: I love science, especially Anatomy and Physiology, but I hated this professors lack of respect for her students. If anyone asked a question she would condescendingly repeat it and make the student answer, even though we are trying to gain clarification. She would make vile comments and gave the impression she hated her job. Try another professor.

comments: This is a great teacher. She will make you work for your grade, but if you are taking bio it is stuff you will most likely have to know. She gives a ton of extra credit and the labs really help.. BTW DON\'T USE PEN!! she will mark you down for it. Test are average just make sure to study and go over the definitions and notes she provides. Take her!!

This class requires a lot of work, both inside and outside of the classroom, so you have to be willing to put the work in. Come to lecture prepared.

comments: Very knowledgeable, respectful, and accessible. The class is tough though, lots of concepts, lots of memorizing, get ready for the lab tests because they\'re hard, I recommend start working on the material for the labs from the beginning of the semester. Though you might have a great grade in your exams, if you don\'t pass the labs you\'re out.

comments: Hardly any homework. Three times she didn\'t have the tests ready for the class, and postponed the test for a later date. She has lab tests and multiple choice tests, labs are graded by YOU, the written is scantron. The lectures are power point, she goes off on tangents. I took a 6 hour class with her and it never lasted longer than 5. Horrible...

comments: Dr. Farner was one of the most effective instructors that I have ever had. Because of her meticulous explanation of the material, I feel very confident and prepared for my career path. I am very fortunate to have taken her class and would highly recommend her.

comments: Dr. Farner is a great teacher but this class was not easy. It was a lot of info and if you miss a class it is hard to catch up. She is a little hard of hearing so if you don\'t speak up when you have a question you may get over looked. You must study to do well. Overall I liked her.

comments: The reason so many people rated her low is because they expect easy A\'s. This teacher made me work for my grade and I walked away actually learning something. One of the most hardest, well deserved, rewarding class I have ever taken. I\'d recommend for anyone. She will make me a better nurse!

comments: If you want to learn...I mean, really learn the material, then take Dr. Farner. She is tough, academically and personally. comments: Dr. Farner is very knowledgable. She takes the time to explain real-life applications in the class. The class is difficult; it is much more than memorization.
